google_play_reviews.content: Just dave I love it and have place it on Firestick. I am wondering if you could make it work for firestick please?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm not sure what this involves... You have it on a Firestick but it's not working? The review boxes here are pretty short, send me an email at playstoresupport@justdave.net and you can explain in more detail.

google_play_reviews.content: i like the concept, i wanted a widget that would actively show warnings. but, it doesn't work that well. i will get a warning on another system, and then i could wait up to an hour before this thing shows that warning.   if i do have something, such as an advisory, and it turns into a warning, it won't update itself. sometimes i have to go into the program to see if the warning is even there, and right now it is, but the widget still shows the expired warning.   it doesn't prioritize the importance of the warning either. it does it by date order. so if you have the 3x1 widget, it shows the last message and not the main one. so like it could say - there is a slippery ice advisory, but hide the warning of a blizzard on the way.   more so, it takes a lot of space on the desktop. there is no reason to take up that much space, the text at the top can be smaller. they can fit more warnings if the tabs were half the height.  -- i'm bumping this to a 4 since the creator did write back, and it might be an issue with my phone. since it does work at least some of the time. i still think it should be a bit smaller looking.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The lack of updating probably has to do with Marshmallow and newer killing background tasks. If you exempt it from battery monitoring it should work. I've been working on a version that does it the new way so it'll avoid that but I haven't gotten it working yet.

google_play_reviews.content:
The best weather app to warn of severe weather watches or warnings from the 
national weather service
Easy to use. Needs a share option though
I wish this had a share option.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: NWS changed their site to require HTTPS.  I just pushed a new version of the app (1.1.3) that takes that into account, it should show up in the next few hours.

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome gadget that shows active weather alerts on my home screen.
Not showing severve thunder storm alerts for some reason needs fixed but shows everything else
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It only shows what the NWS posts for the county you chose. If they don't post it, it won't show in the app.  Also, if you're on Marshmallow or newer, there's an issue with it sometimes taking 5 minutes or so to update after the phone is woken up from being idle, hope to have a fix out for that soon.

google_play_reviews.content: Cant set location, added to home screen and still claims no alerts when ones are out
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The config options are in the app when you run it. I'm actually working on getting it to give you the config screen when you create the widget, look for that in a future release

google_play_reviews.content: Only thing I would love is being able to see where alerts were on a map but I do like being able to keep up on current weather events.
I like the fact it doesn't need special permissions
Severe line of storms, damaging high winds, lightening. Where's widget shown ? Ugh another one deleted ...
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You have to add the widget to your home screen.

google_play_reviews.content: Works great after the https fix. Had to fix my weather website as well. Great app.
Only getting white screen when I select a state....
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Usually that means there are no alerts in the area you selected right now. I do a better job of indicating that in the widget.  Inside the app it's blank, which isn't good. Look for an update soon to fix that.

google_play_reviews.content: Like to read alert details
Awesome job here , 2 suggestions #1 the ability to filter warning types and the ability to set an alert tone for those warnings, this is exactly what I was looking for :)
WEATHER ALERTS
This is OK 4 stars because it does not give a notification if that could be added I would love it
Awesome cuz if there was a tornado this would be helpful so I give you 5 stars
I live in the corner of two states and three counties, only able to choose one state and one county. No option for it to follow via GPS. App is antiquated. One star is being generous
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, I've added those to the feature request list, and hopefully can get some more updates soon.  There hasn't been very much severe weather where I live this year (which is unusual) and thus my incentive to work on it has been less than usual because I don't notice when there isn't severe weather.

google_play_reviews.content: They said that a severe thunderstorm is going to happen on June 10th at like four something and right now it's 6:10!!!! I didn't even see a thunderstorm .What a lie
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The application is not responsible for the data returned by the National Weather Service.  It only reports what the NWS says.
